# delegate

**Instance Property**

The previewing view controller’s delegate for managing preview (peek) and commit (pop) view controllers.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var delegate: any UIViewControllerPreviewingDelegate { get }
```

## Discussion

Set a previewing view controller’s 3D Touch delegate when you register the view controller by calling its [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIViewController/registerForPreviewing(with:sourceView:)] method.

For information on the methods the delegate can implement, read [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIViewControllerPreviewingDelegate].

## Accessing properties of a 3D Touch previewing view controller

- **sourceView**: A source view, in a previewing view controller’s view hierarchy, responds to a 3D Touch by the user.
